subject: Masters Golf Tournament
lead_paragraph: Lee Westwood has won 39 titles and reigned as golf's No. 1 for 22 weeks. But he has never won a major, and the Masters this weekend will be his 60th attempt to win one..
snippet: Lee Westwood has won 39 titles and reigned as golf's No. 1 for 22 weeks. But he has never won a major, and the Masters this weekend will be his 60th attempt to win one..
